column1: Funeral services will be conducted at 3:30 pm on Sunday
column4: at Moody's Funeral Home Chapel in Mount Airy
column6: with the Rev. Buford Jessup officiating. Interment will follow in the Unity Church Cemetery. The family will receive friends on Saturday June 13
column8: from 6:00 to 8:00 pm at Moody Funeral Home.
